Name: Headache
Description: Pain or discomfort in the head or scalp, often caused by stress, tension, or illness.

Name: Fever
Description: A temporary increase in body temperature, often due to infection or inflammation.

Name: Body Pain
Description: Generalized muscle or joint pain throughout the body, typically associated with flu or fatigue.

Name: Sneezing
Description: A sudden, forceful expulsion of air through the nose and mouth, commonly due to allergies or a cold.

Name: Itchy Eyes
Description: Irritation or discomfort in the eyes often caused by allergies, dryness, or infection.

Name: Heartburn
Description: A burning sensation in the chest caused by acid reflux or indigestion.

Name: Cough
Description: A reflex action to clear your airways of mucus or irritants, commonly due to cold or flu.

Name: Diarrhea
Description: Frequent, loose, or watery bowel movements often caused by infection or food intolerance.

Name: Throat Irritation
Description: Soreness or discomfort in the throat, usually caused by infections, allergies, or dryness.

Name: Constipation
Description: Difficulty or infrequent bowel movements, typically due to poor diet, dehydration, or medication.

Name: Skin Cuts
Description: Breaks or tears in the skin usually caused by injury, requiring cleaning and protection.
